Name: Grid
Description: Flexible row/column layout with attached placement properties.

AttachedProperties.Name: GridRow
AttachedProperties.Description: Fluent attached row index for child placement (use .GridRow(i)).

AttachedProperties.Name: GridRowSpan
AttachedProperties.Description: Fluent attached row span for child placement (use .GridRowSpan(n)).

AttachedProperties.Name: GridColumn
AttachedProperties.Description: Fluent attached column index for child placement (use .GridColumn(i)).

AttachedProperties.Name: GridColumnSpan
AttachedProperties.Description: Fluent attached column span for child placement (use .GridColumnSpan(n)).
